targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("tx_bytes"), 10s) FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "com.docker.swarm.service.name" fill(null)
select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT max(used_percent) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and "device" != 'rootfs'  and $timeFilter
select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT mean("n_images") FROM "docker" WHERE "engine_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_containers_running") FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("current_thread_count") FROM "tomcat_connector" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$tomcatHost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("current_threads_busy") FROM "tomcat_connector" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$tomcatHost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: Service
list.name: container
list.query: show tag values with key = "container_name" WHERE engine_host =~ /^$engine_host$/

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: tomcatHost
list.name: tomcatHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tomcat_connector" WITH KEY = "host"
